price: 32. „Ir būti pareigingu savo motinai, ir padarė mane neišpuikėliu, ne nepalaimintu.“
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
